name: Game Master Engine (Map Editor)
description:
A new map making program being built by DantheDM. We are striving to be the best 3D map maker out there, with future features including online hosting and 3D map exporting. We currently have a Discord to keep everyone updated, and a Patreon for those that want the newest version every week or just to support us during development.

Download the free demo and get an early start at your map making before GME officially launches on October 1st for $10!

If you decide to donate towards GME at this stage I will gladly accept!
